hero.title: Master IELTS with AI-Powered Learning
hero.subtitle: An integrated platform with AI tools to help you prepare for IELTS effectively

featuresSection.title: Our Features
featuresSection.subtitle: Discover the powerful tools designed to enhance your IELTS preparation

writingTools.title: Modular AI Tools
writingTools.description: Deeply integrated AI tools that connect with community features and learning accounts - specialized for IELTS preparation

adaptiveTest.title: Adaptive Testing
adaptiveTest.description: Take adaptive tests that adjust to your skill level for more effective practice

aiTutor.title: AI Tutor
aiTutor.description: Get instant answers to your questions about English grammar, vocabulary, or IELTS strategies

vietnamese.title: E-Learning Ecosystem
vietnamese.description: A comprehensive platform emphasizing community features, multiple roles, integration, and democratized education

structured.title: Structured Learning
structured.description: Follow a clear learning path designed to improve your IELTS score systematically

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Monitor your improvement over time with detailed performance analytics

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started with our platform in three simple steps

step1.title: 1. Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up for an account to access all our AI-powered learning tools and track your progress

step2.title: 2. Practice with AI Tools
step2.description: Use our Writing Tools and Adaptive Tests to improve your IELTS skills with personalized feedback

step3.title: 3. Track Your Progress
step3.description: Monitor your improvement over time and identify areas that need more practice

cta.title: Ready to Improve Your IELTS Score?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students who have enhanced their English skills with our platform

footer.description: An AI-powered platform designed to help Vietnamese students prepare for IELTS exams effectively

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource.
errors.networkError: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection.
errors.timeoutError: The request timed out. Please try again.
errors.validationError: Validation error. Please check your input.
errors.authError: Authentication error. Please log in again.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.apiKeyMissing: API key is missing. Please add your API key in the settings.
errors.apiKeyInvalid: API key is invalid. Please check your API key in the settings.
errors.fileUploadError: File upload error. Please try again.
errors.fileDownloadError: File download error. Please try again.
errors.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeded. Please upload a smaller file.
errors.fileTypeNotSupported: File type not supported. Please upload a different file.
